name: Air Conflicts: Pacific Carriers
description: True heroes know no bounds!Experience top combat action in this brand new arcade flight sim and become immersed in the exploits of famous aircraft carriers. Choose the side you want to play on: the US Navy or the Imperial Japanese Navy. Climb into the cockpit and re-live the most famous battles of the War in the Pacific.
minimum_requirements: Minimum OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7                 Processor: Intel/AMD CPU (1.1GHz+)                 Memory: 1 GB                 Hard Disk Space: 2 GB                                 Video Card: Shader 3.0 compatible graphics card with min. 256 MB RAM                 DirectX®: 9.0c                 Sound: Sound card required
recommended_requirements: Recommended OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7                 Processor: Intel/AMD CPU (1.8GHz+)                 Memory: 2 GB                 Hard Disk Space: 2 GB                              Video Card: GeForce 9x or better graphics card with min. 512 MB RAM                 DirectX®: 9.0c                 Sound: Sound card required
